organic.title: Finding the value of old books - AbeBooks
organic.snippet: One very simple method of finding an approximate value of a book is to search for similar copies on AbeBooks.com and see what prices are being asked.

organic.title: Book value: How much is your book worth? - Biblio
organic.snippet: The easiest way to know how much your copy of a book is worth on the open market is to check on how much similar copies are currently being offered for.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I find out what my old books are worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
ASSESSING BOOK VALUES AT A GLANCE:
1
Look for other copies of the book for sale online.
2
Take a close look at the condition of the book.
3
Remember that old does not necessarily mean valuable.
4
Determine if the book is signed or a notable edition.
5
Check out this blog post on book pricing for resale.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is there an app that tells you how much a book is worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: BookScouter is a go-to solution for users who want to sell and buy used or new textbooks at a competitive price. The buyback mobile app compares prices on 30+ vendors and finds the best deals on books.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: BookScouter - Sell & buy books on the App Store

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Where can I find book value?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The book value of a company is equal to its total assets minus its total liabilities. The total assets and total liabilities are on the company's balance sheet in annual and quarterly reports.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Book Value vs. Market Value: What's the Difference? - Investopedia

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to get vintage books appraised?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: There are people who specialize in appraisals of antiquities including books. Just type into your search engine book appraisers (and the city you live in if desired). There are also auction house such as Sothebys, Christies, Doyle and Heritage that will appraise any highly valuable object for a fee.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How does one become a rare books appraiser? - Quora
